item.title: Luanne HTB Writeup
Time HTB Writeup
item.description: Enumeration: Nmap scan: let’s checkout the running web server: its a java beautifier and validator. lets check the source code: nothing interesting in the source code let’s search for hidden directories: $ python3 dirsearch.py -u http://10.10.10.223/ -e txt,html,php,log,zip,bac,bak,tar

item.title: Kioptrix 2 Writeup
item.description: Download kioptrix 2 VM here Services: Apache MySQL Openssh RPC CUPS 0. Getting machine’s ip: Also # netdiscover -r 192.168.1.0/24 works fine. 1. Enumeration: Zenmap: So first things first, let’s check the web server running .. 2. Web Server: Hitting vm’s ip 192.168.1.7 shows us this login form: it’s an admin login , maybe it’s vulnerable to sql injection let’s try to bypass it .

item.title: Null Byte Writeup
item.description: Download VM here. Run it on virtualbox, and let’s get started. 0. Get VM’s IP: $ nmap -sn 192.168.1.0/24 1. Enumeration: Now we can continue to scan the machine and the running services. Using Zenmap (GUI nmap) : $ nmap -T4 -A -v 192.168.1.142 As you can see there are : Apache server running on port 80 rpcbind on port 111 ssh on port 777 2.

item.title: Kioptrix Level 1 Writeup
Duckuino
item.description: It came to my mind to make a rubber ducky using arduino uno which i already have .. so let’s get started. Rubber Ducky is used to perform HID attacks » search it out. Arduino Uno has a chip “Atmegau16u2” or “8u2”, But mine is Arduino Uno R3 with Atmega16u2 chip. The ATmega16U2 chip on your Arduino board acts as a bridge between the computer’s USB port and the main processor’s serial port.
